text: Question Score What is your age? 1 What is the time to the nearest hour? 1 What is the year? 1 Give the patient an address, and ask them to repeat it at 1 the end of the test. What is the name of the hospital or their address? 1 Can the patient recognise two persons (the doctor, nurse, 1 relation, etc.)? What is your date of birth? 1 Historical date e.g. When did World War 1 begin? 1 Name the president. 1 Count backwards from 20 down to 1. 1
